zone.line: [reverso]
in other respects
worst poet, seems to have been purposely
afforded as a divine evidence of the
truth of this opinion? Do I a Do you
think with me o Ion.-- Ion By Jupiter
as it were
Ido. You touch my soul with your words
o Socrates. Exce The great poets The
excellent poets appear to me to be divinely
commissioned as interpreters between the
gods & us.-- Soc. Do not you rhapso
-dists interpret the creations of the poets
Ion. That also is true. Soc. You are then
the interpreters of interpreters. Ion.
Evidently.-- Soc. Now confess the truth
to me, Ion, & conceal not what I ask
of you.-- When you recite some passages
from an Cantin{i} epic poem [ ? ]
climb from a la{ll} ladder
Via
Piazza dalle/Strozzi
